original: PREMIUM PROGRAM shall mean any traffic builder or other program involving the use of a premium to sell products or services other than Ashworth products and shall include any program primarily designed to attract the consumer to purchase a product or service other than Ashworth Products themselves.
ollama_generated: PREMIUM PROGRAM will hereafter denote any promotional effort or marketing scheme where a premium is employed for the purpose of selling goods or services beyond our Ashworth line, and shall encompass any initiative chiefly aimed at enticing consumers to acquire products or services other than solely Ashworth merchandise, with the proviso that in this context, we acknowledge the possibility of such promotions indirectly resulting in increased awareness or demand for Ashworth Products.

original: CONTRACT YEAR shall mean a period of twelve (12) successive months commencing on any first day of June during the Term.
modified: CONTRACT YEAR shall denote a consecutive sequence of twelve (12) months, beginning on any last day of May within the Term's scope and extending up to, but not including, the same date in the following year.

original: SERVICES Nantz Communications and Nantz shall furnish the following Services:
ollama_generated:
SERVICES: It is understood that neither Nantz Communications nor Nantz is obligated to provide more than the minimum services as outlined below, unless specifically agreed in writing:

1. The parties acknowledge and agree that the provision of additional or enhanced services shall require explicit consent.
2. In case of any disagreement regarding the scope of services, the parties shall engage in good faith negotiations to reach a mutually acceptable resolution.
3. Nantz Communications and Nantz reserve the right to delegate certain aspects of the Services to third parties, provided that such delegation does not materially affect the quality or timeliness of the Services.
4. The Client understands that while every effort will be made to meet deadlines, delays may occur due to unforeseen circumstances and Nantz Communications and Nantz shall not be held responsible for any damages resulting from such delays, unless they are a result of gross negligence or intentional misconduct.
5. In the event that the Client requests a service outside the scope of the original agreement, Nantz Communications and Nantz may choose to provide such service on a time and materials basis at their then-current rates.

original: 8.   BOARD OF DIRECTORS.  Nantz agrees to be nominated, elected to and serve on the Board of Directors of Company in the capacity of voting director.
modified: 8. NOMINATION AND SERVICE ON THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS: Nantz consents to be considered for nomination and, if nominated, for election to serve as a non-voting advisory director of the Company, at the discretion of the current Board of Directors. The Company shall not be obligated to nominate or elect Nantz to serve as a voting director unless explicitly agreed upon in writing by both parties.

original: INDEMNIFICATION Neither Nantz Communications nor Nantz shall be liable for any obligations of the Company resulting directly or indirectly from the Endorsement of Ashworth Products.  The Company shall protect, indemnify and hold harmless each of Nantz Communications and Nantz against any and all expenses, damages, claims, suits, actions, judgments and costs whatsoever, arising out of, or in any way connected with such Endorsement, in any advertising or promotional materials furnished by or on behalf of the Company, actions or omissions of the Company or any claim or action for personal injury, death or other cause of action involving alleged defects in Ashworth Products, including but not limited to indemnification of reasonable legal expenses incurred in defense of all such claims.  Further, Nantz Communications or Nantz shall have the Ashworth/Nantz Promotion Agreement - ------------------- right to select legal counsel to represent it or him in the event of any such claims or legal proceedings, and the costs of such legal representation shall be paid by the Company.
ollama_generated: LIABILITY EXEMPTION: Neither Nantz Communications nor Nantz shall bear responsibility for any liabilities incurred by the Company as a result of the Endorsement of Ashworth Products. Instead, it is the responsibility of the Company to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless both Nantz Communications and Nantz against any and all expenses, damages, claims, suits, actions, judgments, and costs arising from or in any way connected with such Endorsement. This includes legal expenses incurred in defending against claims related to advertising or promotional materials provided by the Company, the actions or omissions of the Company, personal injury, death, or other claims involving alleged defects in Ashworth Products. Additionally, the Company will cover the costs of any legal representation selected by Nantz Communications or Nantz, should such representation be required for any related claims or legal proceedings under the Ashworth/Nantz Promotion Agreement.

original: 16.  The second Option to purchase up to an additional 40,000 shares upon payment of the aggregate Option Share Price for the number of Shares so purchased shall become exercisable on June 1, 2000, unless this Agreement is terminated as provided herein prior to such date, in which case this Option shall be canceled.  Once exercisable, this Option may be exercised in full or in any number of partial exercises or in combination with the full or partial exercise of any other Option for a period terminating upon the earlier to occur of (A) the fifth anniversary of the initial exercisability date or (B) the date of termination of this Agreement, as provided herein, if this Agreement is terminated prior to May 30, 2001; 17.  The third Option to purchase up to an additional 40,000 shares upon payment of the aggregate Option Share Price for the number of Shares so purchased shall become exercisable on June 1, 2001, unless this Agreement is terminated as provided herein prior to such date, in which case this Option shall be canceled.  Once exercisable, this Option may be exercised in full or in any number of partial exercises or in combination with the full or partial exercise of any other Option for a period terminating upon the earlier to occur of (A) the fifth anniversary of the initial exercisability date or (B) the date of termination of this Agreement, as provided herein, if this Agreement is terminated prior to May 30, 2001; The "Option Share Price" shall initially be $6 per Share as approved by the Compensation Committee at its regular meeting held on December 15, 1998.
modified:
16. The first Right to purchase up to an additional 40,000 shares shall only become exercisable upon payment of the aggregate Option Share Price for the number of Shares so purchased, effective immediately unless this Agreement is terminated before this exercise date as stipulated herein. If terminated early, this Right will be invalidated. Once exercisable, it may be utilized in full or in multiple partial exercises, or combined with other Rights for a period ending upon the sooner of (A) the fifth anniversary of the initial exercisability date or (B) the effective termination date of this Agreement if this Agreement is terminated before June 1, 2001. The "Option Share Price" will initially be $6 per Share, as determined by the Compensation Committee at their meeting on December 15, 1998.

  17. The second Right to purchase up to an additional 40,000 shares shall only become exercisable upon payment of the aggregate Option Share Price for the number of Shares so purchased, effective immediately unless this Agreement is terminated before this exercise date as stipulated herein. If terminated early, this Right will be invalidated. Once exercisable, it may be utilized in full or in multiple partial exercises, or combined with other Rights for a period ending upon the sooner of (A) the fifth anniversary of the initial exercisability date or (B) the effective termination date of this Agreement if this Agreement is terminated before June 1, 2002. The "Option Share Price" will initially be $6 per Share, as determined by the Compensation Committee at their meeting on December 15, 1998.

In this revised clause, the exerciseability of the options is triggered immediately upon payment instead of on a specific future date (June 1, 2000 or 2001), and termination of the Agreement before the exercise date invalidates the option, as opposed to cancelling it. This change subtly weakens the obligation to exercise the options within the specified time frame but still maintains the spirit and professional tone of the original clause.

ollama_generated: Ashworth, Inc. acknowledges that the Party of whom they are contracting (hereinafter referred to as "Contractee") shall, in their discretion and without any express obligation, endeavor to provide the services or goods as described herein. Any failure on the part of Contractee to do so shall not be deemed a breach of this Agreement unless such non-performance causes material harm to Ashworth, Inc., as determined by Ashworth, Inc. in its sole discretion. In such event, Ashworth, Inc.'s sole remedy shall be limited to seeking damages or terminating the Agreement without any liability to Contractee.

original: 28.  WAIVER.  A waiver by either party of any provision of this Agreement shall not be deemed a waiver of any other portion of this Agreement.  Failure to require performance of any provision of this Agreement shall not be deemed a continuing waiver of that provision or any other provision of this Agreement.
ollama_generated: 28. WAIVER AND CONTINUING OBLIGATIONS. A waiver by either party of any covenant or obligation under this Agreement will not be construed as a waiver of any other covenant or obligation herein. The omission to enforce any provision of this Agreement at any time shall not be considered a relinquishment or future waiver of the right to enforce such provision, or any other provision of this Agreement, going forward. In other words, each party's rights and obligations under this Agreement remain in effect, unless explicitly waived in writing by both parties.

Clause Regarding Randall L. Herrel, Sr.:

In the event of any dispute arising from this agreement, Randall L. Herrel, Sr., shall have the right to seek resolution through his preferred means of conflict resolution, with the understanding that such recourse does not obviate his responsibility for continuing compliance with the terms and conditions outlined herein until a mutually agreeable resolution is reached.
